title: Understanding Stigmatizers
text: Consider the role of healthcare professionals and their attitudes towards mental health patients.

title: Identifying Stereotypical Attitudes
text: Think about how certain healthcare professionals might view mental health patients differently from other patients.

hintAnswer: nurses in medical settings with stereotypical attitudes toward clients with mental illnesses, $$psychiatric-mental$$ health nurses, and/or psychiatry
title: Types of Nurses
text: Which types of nurses might have stereotypical attitudes towards clients with mental illnesses?
choices: nurses in medical settings with stereotypical attitudes toward clients with mental illnesses
